subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: The former Premier League club Leeds kept its F.A. Cup run alive by stunning Tottenham in a 2-2 draw on a penalty shot by Jermaine Beckford in the sixth minute of stoppage time.
snippet: The former Premier League club Leeds kept its F.A. Cup run alive by stunning Tottenham in a 2-2 draw on a penalty shot by Jermaine Beckford in the sixth minute of stoppage time.
